name: Q-Base
description: I created the library website called Q-Base to help developers identify tools to increase development quality and speed. In order to get inspiration for creating a nice user interface, I visited several sorts of websites in the same business as well as online communities like Dribbble. I also added an AI search feature using ChatGPT to make the user experience more enjoyable.

name: Viewflix
description: I used Next.JS to build a stunning full-stack Netflix (clone) web application, which also used Magic for email authentication and Hasura for the database. Users of this app can watch a variety of videos and rate them favorably or negatively. Users can rewatch their favorite videos in their personal 'my list' page because all content is personalized.

name: Dee coffee
description: A coffee shop locator, this full-stack web application uses a geolocation API service to show you a collection of the closest coffee shops within a specified radius around you. [Please note: the database does not save your location data]

name: DEE BLOG
description: I created the multipage blog site Dee Blog with an enjoyable user experience in mind. I got inspiration for creating a nice user interface by browsing many types of websites within the same business, including websites like awwwards.
